column4: Hello, can someone help me setup my wireless connection? I'm using a Broadcom b43 driver and I just installed ndiswrapper. I'm not sure what to do now.
sudo rmmod bcm43xx && sudo rmmod ndiswrapper && sudo modprobe ndiswrapper
That ought to be all if ndiswrapper is set up properly.
Jester45: thanks i'll give those a try
